description: This file defines the AppStateProvider class in Dart, which manages application state related to user subscription status (premium status). It includes methods to toggle the premium flag and persist this state using shared preferences.

classes.name: AppStateProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the application's premium user state, allowing toggling and persistence of this flag.

methods.name: togglePremium
methods.description: Toggles the premium status flag, notifies listeners about the change, and saves the new state in shared preferences.
